name: EXTREME RACING MAFIA CAR
description:
EXTREME RACING MAFIA CAR with heavy loaded guns and shot all mafia gangsters one by one on the highway roads you need to clear your area from enemy gang. target em up with missile just get them destroyed using your car

Features
• Top Death missile Cars with Heavy Weapons
• Multi Challenging Missions
• Easy to play
• Shooting and NOS Control Buttons
• Multiple Camera Views for Easy Shoot
• Smooth and Easy controls
• Buy Missiles and ammo with coins
